Export profile to the internal or external storage.
Import profile from the internal or external storage.
To enable or disable the writing of the log.
Save the log to \"TaskAutomation_log_yyyy-mm-dd_hh-mm-ss-ttt.txt\", and then clear the log file. (yyyy: year, mm: month, dd: day, hh: hour, mm: minute, ss: second, ttt: ms)
Clear the log.
Send log file by E-Mail to the developer.
Send log file to the developer.
Send
Preview

Send log file by E-Mail to the developer.
 1.Press the Preview button to see the temp_log.txt, then please check the contents.(If the selection screen of the application is displayed, and then select the FAVORIT application to display the text file.)
 2.When you are finished reading file to send, then select the E-Mail in EMail selection dialog.
 3.Enter the message in the EMAIL body if necessary. (The log file is attached with compressed into zip and )
To enable or disable the QuickTask.
Invoke QuickTask settings.
Manage log file
Manage the log files.（Delete, Browse, Send etc）
Manage trusted device
Manage the trusted item list.（Delete and add item）
